duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate recommendations and implement solutions to technical issues.
Learn new skills quickly and effectively share technical depth with others.
Participate in and seek training to maintain current technical knowledge.
Develop complete knowledge of the firm's philosophy and be conversant with its reports, policies, procedures, and opinions on financial matters.
Lead responsible, knowledgeable, and trained staff.
Maintain a hybrid schedule of 3 days in the office and 2 days at home.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Accounting
